title: Herbalism for Kids Course - Centre of Excellence
description: Your child will discover the chemicals within herbs, how to identify and make products from herbs, and which herbs to use for specific ailments.
cleaned_text: A State of the Art e-Learning Experience We provide a state of the art online learning platform, accessible from anywhere, learning available 24/7. - Access Your Personalised Course Library View your courses in your online course library. - On-the-go Learning Learn on your mobile, tablet, laptop or via audio. - Join our thriving online community Over 1 million learners. - Lifetime access Learn in your own time at your own pace.
